DOC.detailed_description: 40 patient stage Ⅰ～Ⅲ Gastric Cancer , receive surgery keep tumor tissue , randomly divide group A（receive Ag-D-CIK treatment chemotherapy ) group B（just receive chemotherapy ) , randomize ratio 1:1 . Patients group A receive 3 cycle Ag-D-CIK treatment ( every 1 month ) 4 cycle chemotherapy ( every 2 week ) .Patients group B receive 4 cycle chemotherapy（every 2 week ) .
